Rhinox::

When Rhinox looked his friend fell he ran where he was and asked 
him "Are you Ok Ratchet?"

Noble shot 25 against Speedbraker.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: i assume you mean Sideswipe Soulstice
> 
> :::Ratchet/Sideswipe:::
> 
> ::Ratchet gets hit by one of the shots.  He feels fine at first, 
but then 
> feels a pain in his legs. they ahve been immobilized by the shots. 
Now he 
> cannot dodge anything::
> Ratchet: SLAG!
> ::He can still move his arms, though, so he fires 15 shots from 
each gun and 
> 2 tusk missles at Speedbreaker::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sideswipe transforms to car mode and escapes Beastbox's attack, 
but he gest
